column4: hi, i have a problem with gnome, gnome-failsafe session works fine, but normal session doesnt (it just stays orange after the login sound, no bars, nothing works..) anyone know how i can fix this?
play around with your graphic modes
graphic modes? everything worked fine till about 16 mins ago.. err wtf SLI is disabled and i didnt do a thing
omg that just might be it, sli is on (says nvidia-settings) but it also says second card has NV driver instead of nvidia
